mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code cc WHERE e.dept_code = cc.code_no) AS dept_name, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code cc WHERE e.rank_code = cc.code_no) AS rank_name, (SELECT p.pho_name FROM photo p WHERE p.ref_idx = e.emp_no) AS profile_img FROM emp e WHERE email=#{param1}

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(annual) FROM leave_history lh WHERE leave_division = '-' AND emp_no = #{param1}) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT SUM(annual) FROM leave_history lh WHERE leave_division = '+' AND emp_no = #{param1}) - (SELECT SUM(annual) FROM leave_history lh WHERE leave_division = '-' and emp_no = #{param1}) END AS leftover FROM leave_history lh2 GROUP BY leftover
